actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT camera_master.camera_id, camera_master.area_id, camera_master.camera_type, camera_master.manufacturer, camera_master.model, camera_master.resolution, camera_master.fps, camera_master.ir_enabled, camera_master.description, camera_master.process_type, camera_master.rtsp_url, camera_master.created_by, camera_master.created_date, area_ref.area_name, site_ref.site_name, camera_master.status, camera_master.description
FROM camera_master INNER JOIN area_ref
ON camera_master.area_id = area_ref.area_id
INNER JOIN site_ref
ON camera_master.site_id = site_ref.site_id
ORDER BY {{Select1.selectedOptionValue}} {{Select2.selectedOptionValue}};
